title: Commander Keen comic poster
content:
I made a "poster" of my upcoming comic that I never get my butt to around completing. I would of looked better but I was trying out a new drawing program (open canvas) but ended up coloring it in Photoshop because it was crap.

[img]http://img276.echo.cx/img276/6747/poster13ws.png[/img]

The title of the series I am working on is called "Commander Keen and the Triquantifier Machine"-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: coming soon.

title: Re: Commander Keen comic poster
